Jli ToW.?.(4-0) 372.16TH SEPTEMBER, 1940.COPY NO.WAR CABINETaESTIMATE OP CASUALTIES IN AIR RAIDS. .Note "by - the secretary the attached estimate of casualties in air raids, between the 7th and the 14th September,has been prepared in the Ministry of Home Security,and is circulated by direction of the PrimeMinisterc(Signed) E.E. - BRIDGES.Secretary?Richmond Terrace, S.W.la16TH SEPTEMBER, 1940.
